suncertify.client.gui

Class ContractorRecordPanel.BrokerInputVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.InputVerifier
      • suncertify.client.gui.ContractorRecordPanel.BrokerInputVerifier
  • Enclosing class:
    ContractorRecordPanel

    private class ContractorRecordPanel.BrokerInputVerifier
extends javax.swing.InputVerifier
    The BrokerInputVerifier class provides the input verification functionality for fields that use the JFormattedTextField for text editing in this panel.
    See Also:
    ContractorRecordPanel.addRateComponents(GridBagLayout), ContractorRecordPanel.addSizeComponents(GridBagLayout)

      • verify

        public boolean verify(javax.swing.JComponent txtField)
        Performs the verification of the value in a JFormattedTextField depending on the formatter object used in its construction.
        Specified by:
        verify in class javax.swing.InputVerifier
        Parameters:
        txtField - A reference to a JFormattedTextField object.
        Returns:
        true if the value in the input text field or false otherwise.
